trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Stuart
There were no other sightings in Stuart on or around July 22nd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsOne day I was at the beach, and suddenly, I see a bright object moving across the sky at maybe about 750 mph mph. It was coming from St. Lucie and was heading toward Ft. Pierce. I was the only witness to this event, as my parents and brother weren't paying any attention at the time. But as I saw htis object, I became very shocked but excited because I was into the UFO phenomenon and it was a great moment for me. However, at first, I thought it was only a fighter jet, but I then realized that it was noiseless and very bright to be one.
